name: Empowered Strike
desc: Grant yourself a buff that empowers your next basic attack, dealing 250% attack damage. The buff expires after 5 seconds or if you attack.

name: Fearless Challenge
desc: Taunt all enemies within xxx units, redirecting their attention to you. All enemies taunted with this effect lose x% attack.

name: Shield Charge
desc: Charge forward with your shield in front of you in the direction of your cursor for xxx units. Enemies in the way of the charge take x% attack damage and are knocked aside. Grant yourself the [Knight's Shield] buff for the duration of the charge. [Knight's Shield]: Block 50% of incoming damage.

name: Roundslash
desc: Perform a circular swing with your sword, dealing x% attack damage to all enemies struck. Deals an additional x% attack damage for each enemy within range.

name: Guardian
desc: Target either yourself or an ally with the [Knight's Shield] buff for 3 seconds. If the target is an ally, dash to them. [Knight's Shield]: Block 50% of incoming damage.

name: All-Rounder
desc: Embrace a balanced fighting style, raising your ATK stat by x% of your DEF stat, and raising your DEF stat by x% of your ATK stat.

name: Protective Footwork
desc: Quickly step back, and then rush forward, dealing x%/x%/x% attack damage, increasing with each use. This skill can be used up to 2 additional times shortly after the first cast. The backwards step grants you the [Knight's Shield] buff. [Knight's Shield]: Block 50% of incoming damage.

name: Shield Bash
desc: Thrust your shield forward, dealing x% attack damage and stunning enemies hit for xxx seconds. If you have the [Knight's Shield] buff, increase the attack damage to x% and the stun to xxx seconds.

name: Aegis Aura
desc: Bring forth the power within your shield, granting you a xxx unit radius aura that grants the [Aegis Aura] buff to you and any allies within range. [Aegis Aura]: Increases ATK by x%, DEF by x%, and HP regen by xxx.

name: Greater Shielding
desc: Further enhance your blocking ability, allowing each [Knight's Shield] buff you receive to fully mitigate the damage from one attack. After this effect activates, it will go on cooldown before it can activate again.

name: Spread Shot
desc: Fire 5 arrows in a cone, dealing 80% damage with each arrow and pushing you back slightly. Each enemy can only be hit by a single arrow.

name: Move Like Wind
desc: Use the power of wind to temporarily bolster your movement speed by 4 and 100% of your attack speed, and your attack speed by 25% of your movement speed for 3 seconds.

name: Triple Shot
desc: Fire 3 homing arrows in quick succession at a single enemy, dealing 80% attack damage with each arrow.

name: Mantle of Titania
desc: Throw the cloak of fairies in front of you as protection, nullifying projectiles that collide with it. Each projectile nullified by this effect restores 10% of your missing MP. Enemies that collide with the cloak also take 15% wind damage.

name: Gate of Wind
desc: Summons a magical gate that enchants all allied projectiles that pass through it, allowing them to pierce enemies and walls, resetting their range, doubling their speed, and giving them an extra 10% damage modifier and 20% critical hit chance. The gate takes 0.5 seconds to activate and lasts for 10 seconds.

name: Arrow Rain
desc: Rain arrows over a large area targeted around the cursor, dealing 60% attack damage to all enemies in the area every second for 5 seconds.

name: Unyielding Arrows
desc: Your experience hunting agile targets taught you to be relentless with your shots, granting you the [Unyielding Arrows] buff for 3 seconds each time you use a skill. Also restores your MP by 5 each time you land a critical hit. [Unyielding Arrows]: Increases critical hit rate by 2% per stack. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: Fae Blessing
desc: The fae will always be by your side when you rely upon them. Upon dropping below 30% of your max HP, gain the [Fae Blessing] buff for 10 seconds. Can also be used on allies regardless of their HP percentage, putting the skill on half its regular cooldown. [Fae Blessing]: restore 2% max HP and 2% max MP per second.

name: Tornado Shot
desc: Fire a powerful piercing shot that creates strong winds, dealing 40% wind damage to all enemies within the skill's area and pushing them back up to 3 times.

name: Stormpiercer
desc: Your absolute mastery over the bow grants your the power to summon an additional piercing shot that hits enemies it passes through for 130% attack damage. This additional shot activates at a 20% chance each time you land a skill hit. The chance is halved if the skill is an Area of Effect.

name: Fireball
desc: Shoot a ball of condensed fire magic, dealing 180% fire damage and applying a 10 second [Burn] debuff to the first target hit. If you have the [Primordial Mana] buff, summon a meteor that deals 260% fire damage and inflicting [Burn] up to 3 times to all enemies it hits. [Burn]: Take either 10% attack damage or 100% fire attack per second, whichever is higher. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Blizzard
desc: Conjure chilling winds around you, dealing 30% ice damage 5 times and applying [Chilled] for 0.5 seconds with each hit. If you have the [Primordial Mana] buff, channel a freezing blast after a short delay, dealing 640% ice damage in a large area and stunning all hit targets for 3 seconds. [Chilled]: Reduce movement speed by 30%.

name: Chain Lightning
desc: Charge up lightning magic towards the targeted enemy, dealing 170% lightning damage to the first target struck. The lightning then bounces to a different target up to 3 targets, dealing 20% less lightning damage with each bounce. If you have the [Primordial Mana] buff, the lightning will bounce up to 7 times instead of 3, and each bounce will trigger an addtional 200% lightning damage strike.

name: Spatial Leap
desc: Temporarily distort space to blink to target location. You can reactivate the skill within 5 seconds to blink back to your original location.

name: Meditative Training
desc: Your meditative training expanded your magical capacity, giving you 100 extra max MP, along with doubling the rate at which you restore mana when you remain standing still.

name: Volcano
desc: Create a miniature volcano at the target location, pushing enemies aside and creating impassable terrain. The volcano then randomly spews out fireballs that land close to it, dealing 130% fire damage to enemies hit along with inclicting [Burn] for 10 seconds. [Burn]: Take either 10% attack damage or 100% fire attack per second, whichever is higher. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Icicle Salvo
desc: Summon 6 floating icicles that fly towards up to 6 targets, hitting a small area around each target for 220% ice damage. Multiple icicles that hit the same target deal only 25% of its original damage modifier.

name: Lightning Rod
desc: Drop a bolt of lightning from the sky, dealing 150% lightning damage to all enemies in its area. The area then inflicts the [Electrified] debuff to all enemies inside of it for 8 seconds. [Electrified]: reduces fire, ice, lightning, earth, and wind defense by 8.

name: Mana Detonation
desc: Focus your magic power to turn the target's mana against it. After a short delay, the target's mana detonates, dealing 340% attack damage and reducing the target's mana by 30% of your attack stat.

name: Primordial Mana
desc: Tap into the ancient magical energy hidden in nature, granting you the [Primordial Mana] buff for a duration equal to this skill's cooldown. [Primordial Mana]: Your next cast of a basic elemental spell is enhanced as indicated on that spell's description.

name: Shadow Step
desc: Become invisible, and after a short delay, teleport to an enemy target or an allied Poison/Shock Trap, dealing 260% attack damage if it's an enemy. Cooldown refreshes upon teleporting to an allied Poison/Shock Trap.

name: Vicious Venom
desc: Grants a 3 second buff that applies a stackable 6 second [Poison] debuff to your basic attacks. [Poison]: Take 5% of base attack damage per second, stacks up to 10 times.

name: Dual Traps
desc: On first cast: Place an AoE [Poison] Trap at the targeted location. On second cast: Place a single-target stunning Shock Trap at the targeted location. Both traps take a second to arm before they can activate. [Poison]: Take 5% of base attack damage per second, stacks up to 10 times.

name: Quick Feet
desc: Your experience being on the run taught you to move faster, passively increasing your movement speed by 15%.

name: Triple Fangs
desc: Quickly stab 3 times in front of you, dealing more damage to enemies that are closer to you. The first two hits deal 80% to 130% attack damage, and the final hit deals 100 to 150% attack damage. This attack adds an additional 50% damage modifier if the target has 5 or more stacks of [Poison].

name: Vitality Thief
desc: Your expertise in thievery taught you the art of stealing life essence. Every time you successfully land 5 consecutive hits on the same target, heal yourself for 5% of your missing HP. Hits from the Living Shadow skill do not count.

name: Swift Slicer
desc: Harass a target by dashing through them 5 times for 70% attack damage per strike. Become invulnerable to attacks during this time.

name: Punish the Strong
desc: Your hatred towards those in power bolsters your attacks. Successfully landing a [Poison] debuff on an enemy above 90% max HP increases your final damage by 10% for 10 seconds.

name: Living Shadow
desc: Summon a shadow clone to assist you with your attacks. The clone will follow you and copy your basic attacks, Vicious Venom, and Triple Fangs with reduced damage. The clone loses 1/30th of its health per second, and can receive allies' buffs and take damage as if it was a regular ally.

name: Slippery Save
desc: Summon a harmless decoy on yourself or an ally within range and make the target invisible for 3 seconds, nullifying the damage and effects of most attacks. The decoy cannot take damage, move, or attack, and disappears after the target emerges from invisibility.
